name: Snail Maze
description:
This a port of the classic game Snail Maze, It was originally a hidden game within the Sega Master System's BIOS, but it was eventually removed due to memory constraints and never got a cartridge release.

I made this port because I needed a nice and simple game to create for my first project in Godot, and with that, I hope you enjoy your descent into madness as you attempt to beat this god forsaken game.

(Please don't sue me Sega, it's just Snail Maze)
